A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Awful\, awful movie.  Serious pacing issues; non-sensical scenes; plot holes; terrible jokes; ridiculous new characters.  These are just some of the wreckage this movie brought the audience.

I did not care for many of the scenes that most other reviewers are speaking of (Superman Leia\, bombs dropping in space\, Luke as a hermit).  But what I really did not like was the new character\, Rose.  She honestly ruined this movie for me.  I thought her character annoying and the actress to be subpar at best\, and that is putting it nicely.  And\, she was in quite a bit of the movie.  By the time she gave her inane speech about war and capitalism\, I almost got up and left the theater.  

Another issue I had with this film is the leftist dialogue.  I do not know why anyone thought it would work in a Star Wars film\, because it didn't.  I really found it to be insulting.

I cannot fathom who wrote this script and who gave it the green light.  It needs a serious overhaul to be even considered a decent movie.  BUT\, it should be stripped of the right to call itself a Star Wars movie.
